law.catch_line: The Trust shall retain an architect as a consultant....

text.section: The Trust shall retain an architect as a consultant.

The consultant must:
be registered by the State Board of Architects;
be familiar with all phases of 18th century architecture; and
have the professional experience that is needed to restore the State House in a way that befits its majestic history and its current role as the Capitol.
The consultant is entitled to the compensation provided in the State budget.
